EmailTemplate.name: TSE: AWS re:Invent-Las Vegas 11_26_18.002 Pre-Event: Email Invite 1 - 1a: 2016-2
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, see you at AWS re:Invent?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
If you’re attending AWS re:Invent, we’d like to meet with you. We know you’re busy so we’ll cut to the chase - here’s our value to you:
- AWS trusts us: Turbonomic is one of only two AWS partners to achieve AWS Competencies in both Migration and Cloud Management.
- We are here to help you: Turbonomic accelerates AWS cloud migrations and prevents overspending that may stall or slow your cloud journey.
- Our executives know what they’re doing: Members of our executive team attending include:
- Ben Nye - Turbonomic CEO, 5X Forbes Midas List - Bill Veghte - Turbonomic Executive Chairman, former EVP HPE, SVP Microsoft Windows - Jennifer Heard - Turbonomic SVP, former VP Microsoft Worldwide Sales and Marketing Strategy
Meet with us for just 30 minutes, and walk away prepared to maximize your AWS cloud experience.
Please request a meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]>.
Best, Catherine
